snippet.title: Final Fantasy (NES) playthrough ~Longplay~
snippet.description:
This is a playthrough of Final Fantasy for NES.

Released in 1987, Final Fantasy sees four Warriors of Light on a journey to restore light to the orbs to save their world.

Given the nature of this game's high random encounter rate and difficulty pacing I've edited out duplicate encounters and occasionally spent time grinding off-screen to make sure the video doesn't become repetitive, so if you see my team's level jump higher than it was in the previous battle, that'll be why.

The NES version of the game's an interesting one in that while it has some archaic (and in some cases non-functional) mechanics that would be tweaked in later remakes, I enjoy the visuals and music enough to appreciate this version, and had a fun time playing through the game. It's a recommendation with caveats, but a recommendation all the same.

#FinalFantasy #Longplay
